title: Secure Analytics Platform
context: The client required a secure, air-gapped analytics platform to process sensitive operational data. Existing tools did not meet compliance or performance requirements.
challenge: Deliver a system that could handle large-scale data ingestion and analysis while meeting strict security and audit requirements, with no connectivity to public networks.
approach: We designed and built a dedicated platform with hardened infrastructure, role-based access, full audit logging, and batch processing pipelines. All work was done in a controlled environment with cleared personnel.
outcome: The platform was delivered on schedule and passed security review. It now supports daily analysis at scale while maintaining full compliance and traceability.

title: AI-Powered Customer Analytics Platform
context: The client needed a scalable analytics platform to derive insight from high-volume customer interactions while preserving data governance and latency requirements.
ourRole: We designed and delivered the core platform, including data pipelines and analytical models, with strict access controls and auditability.
result: The system was deployed on schedule and met performance and compliance targets. Outcomes include a 35% increase in conversion rates, 50% reduction in customer churn, real-time analytics with sub-100ms latency, and processing of 10M+ events daily. The client runs daily analysis at scale.

title: Enterprise SaaS Management Platform
context: A large enterprise required a unified platform for workflows, collaboration, and business intelligence with real-time analytics and high availability.
ourRole: We led architecture and implementation of the platform, including workflow automation, collaboration features, and BI tooling.
result: The platform was launched and now serves 500+ enterprise clients with 99.9% uptime SLA achieved, 50% reduction in operational costs, and scalability to 1M+ users.

title: Cross-Platform Mobile Banking App
context: A regional bank needed a secure mobile application for iOS and Android with real-time transactions, biometric authentication, and fraud detection.
ourRole: We built the mobile application and integrated it with existing core banking and security systems, with emphasis on compliance and reliability.
result: The app was released to production with 100K+ active users, a 4.8/5 app store rating, zero security breaches, and 99.5% transaction success rate.

title: E-Commerce Platform with AI Recommendations
context: A retail client required a modern e-commerce platform with personalized recommendations, performant search, and a reliable checkout experience.
ourRole: We delivered the platform and recommendation stack, including search and payment integration, with a focus on performance and maintainability.
result: The platform went live with a 40% increase in average order value, 60% improvement in search relevance, 2x faster page load times, and 25% increase in customer retention.

title: Healthcare Management System
context: A healthcare network needed a unified system for patient records, scheduling, telemedicine, and analytics while meeting strict regulatory requirements.
ourRole: We designed and implemented the system with appropriate access controls, audit trails, and integration to existing clinical workflows.
result: The system was deployed across 50+ healthcare facilities with 90% reduction in appointment scheduling time, 100% data security compliance, and real-time patient data synchronization.

title: Real Estate Platform
context: An agency required a marketplace with virtual tours, matching capabilities, and transaction support for agents and buyers.
ourRole: We built the platform and mobile experience, including virtual tour integration and transaction flows.
result: The platform launched with 30% increase in property viewings, AI matching at 85% accuracy, virtual tours reducing site visits by 40%, and 500+ properties listed.

title: Velora — Premium Ride-Hailing Platform
context: A transportation startup needed a ride-hailing application for the Ghanaian market with real-time tracking, multiple ride tiers, and transparent pricing.
ourRole: We developed the mobile application and backend, including map integration, booking flows, and driver and ride history.
result: The app was released to production with seamless real-time location tracking, multiple ride tiers, complete ride history with driver details, transparent GHS pricing, and interactive map-based booking. Core flows and reliability met the client's expectations.

title: Wellness Tracker — Health & Wellness Platform
context: A wellness company needed an application for tracking, session booking, and membership management with a clear, calm user experience.
ourRole: We built the mobile app and supporting backend, including progress tracking, booking, and membership tiers.
result: The application was launched with comprehensive wellness tracking, multi-step session booking, tiered membership management, progress visualization, and daily wellness tips. The client runs it in production for daily tracking and bookings.

title: Chez Amis Bar and Grill — Premium Restaurant Website
context: An upscale restaurant required a website for reservations, ordering, menu display, and events, with a distinct visual identity.
ourRole: We designed and developed the website, including reservation and ordering flows, menu presentation, and gallery.
result: The site launched with an elegant dark theme and premium golden accents, seamless online reservation system, food ordering and delivery, comprehensive menu and signature dishes, immersive gallery, private dining and event booking, and 24/7 operational information. The client maintains and uses it for daily operations.

title: Extreme Dept Kidz — Web Platform
context: The client needed a performant, scalable web platform with reliable content delivery and a solid foundation for future growth.
ourRole: We engineered the platform with emphasis on performance, scalability, and maintainability, using modern tooling and practices.
result: The platform was delivered and went live with optimized performance and fast page load times, scalable architecture supporting growth, reliable infrastructure with consistent uptime, modern responsive UI, and efficient content management and delivery. It is ready for further expansion.
